Package org.lwjgl.stb

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    STBIEOFCallback.SAM
    A functional interface for STBIEOFCallback.
    STBIReadCallback.SAM
    A functional interface for STBIReadCallback.
    STBISkipCallback.SAM
    A functional interface for STBISkipCallback.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    STBDXT
    Native bindings to stb_dxt.h from the stb library.
    STBEasyFont
    Native bindings to stb_easy_font.h from the stb library.
    STBIEOFCallback
    Instances of this interface may be set to the eof field of the STBIIOCallbacks struct.
    STBIIOCallbacks
    Image IO callbacks, used by STBImage#stb_load_from_callbacks.
    STBImage
    Native bindings to stb_image.h from the stb library.
    STBImageResize
    Native bindings to stb_image_resize.h from the stb library.
    STBImageWrite
    Native bindings to stb_image_write.h from the stb library.
    STBIReadCallback
    Instances of this interface may be set to the read field of the STBIIOCallbacks struct.
    STBISkipCallback
    Instances of this interface may be set to the skip field of the STBIIOCallbacks struct.
    STBPerlin
    Native bindings to stb_perlin.h from the stb library.
    STBRectPack
    Native bindings to stb_rect_pack.h from the stb library.
    STBRPContext
    The opaque stbrp_context struct.
    STBRPNode
    The opaque stbrp_node struct.
    STBTruetype
    Native bindings to stb_truetype.h from the stb library.
    STBTTAlignedQuad
    Quad used for drawing a baked character, returned by STBTruetype.stbtt_GetBakedQuad(java.nio.ByteBuffer, int, int, int, java.nio.ByteBuffer, java.nio.ByteBuffer, java.nio.ByteBuffer, int).
    STBTTBakedChar
    Baked character data, returned by STBTruetype.stbtt_BakeFontBitmap(java.nio.ByteBuffer, int, float, java.nio.ByteBuffer, int, int, int, int, java.nio.ByteBuffer).
    STBTTFontinfo
    An opaque structure that contains font information.
    STBTTPackContext
    An opaque structure which holds all the context needed from STBTruetype.stbtt_PackBegin(java.nio.ByteBuffer, java.nio.ByteBuffer, int, int, int, int, java.nio.ByteBuffer) to STBTruetype#stbtt_STBPackEnd.
    STBTTPackedchar
    Packed character data, returned by STBTruetype.stbtt_PackFontRange(java.nio.ByteBuffer, java.nio.ByteBuffer, int, float, int, int, java.nio.ByteBuffer)
    STBTTPackRange
    A range of packed character data, returned by STBTruetype.stbtt_PackFontRanges(java.nio.ByteBuffer, java.nio.ByteBuffer, int, java.nio.ByteBuffer, int)
    STBTTVertex
    Vertex data.
    STBVorbis
    Native bindings to stb_vorbis.c from the stb library.
    STBVorbisAlloc
    A buffer to use for allocations by STBVorbis
    STBVorbisInfo
    Information about a Vorbis stream.
